name: To New Horizons
description:
Hello and welcome to New Horizons! A simple town with 2 villagers. Come and enjoy the scenery, have a drink, and partake in some good old fashioned vacation. I think Tom Nook needs a hand with something first, so make sure to lend a hand to the needy raccoon.

I made this game for the Screamlite game jam. My first game jam, also my first ever game! So I hope you enjoy it ;) Please leave some feedback, I would greatly appreciate it. All art assets are made by me.

Credits:

Music:

Antis Instrumentals.

Scott Arc.
